A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It felt like a CW hero show at some points. It felt like Spaceballs at others. Turned into a weird Casino Royale thing for a second. Then a magical horse/camel race. Then add in some Family Guy jokes that go on 3beats too long. Turn Luke into The Grinch on Mt. Crumpit and Rey into Little Cindy Loo Who. Heard of FaceTime? Well Jedis have ForceTime. I'm not even going to discuss Leia and her ice zombie levitating through space flight. Oh and for the lifelong fans. Yoda shows up and declares all Jedi teaching and beliefs to be a real snooze and burns down the temple. But buy your kid a porg because they screech uncontrollably. Adorable.
